tool.name: Scater: Calculate QC metrics
tool.description: Computes QC metrics from single-cell expression matrix

param.name: counts
param.label: Expression matrix in tabular format
param.help: The first column of all files is assumed to be feature names and the first row is assumed to be sample names

param.name: col_data
param.label: Format dataset describing the features in tabular format
param.help: The number of rows (samples) must equal the number of columns in the expression matrix

param.name: mt_controls
param.label: Dataset containing the list of the mitochondrial control genes

param.name: ercc_controls
param.label: Dataset containing the list of the ERCC controls

param.name: cell_controls
param.label: Dataset containing the list of the cell controls
param.help: Cell (sample) names used to identify cell controls (for example, blank wells or bulk controls)

tool.help: Calculate QC metrics for single-cell RNA-seq analysis using Scater.
